name: PerformanceCenterTesting
description: Run a Performance Center test from a task in a Team Foundation Server build process.
author: MicroFocus

inputs.name: varPCServer
inputs.label: PC server and port
inputs.helpMarkDown: The address of your PC server and port, in the format http(s)://(PCServer):(port#)

inputs.name: varUserName
inputs.label: User name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The PC username that will access this PC server.

inputs.name: varPassWord
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: The password for the PC username. You can create a variable of type secret in the TFS build to store the password (for example: 'PCPassword') and specify the variable instead (for example: '$(PCPassword)') to avoid exposing a password in the build configuration

inputs.name: varDomain
inputs.label: Domain
inputs.helpMarkDown: The domain in which the tests to run are stored.

inputs.name: varProject
inputs.label: Project
inputs.helpMarkDown: The project in which the tests to run are stored.

inputs.name: varTestID
inputs.label: Test ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: The ID number (found in PC) of the Performance Center test.

inputs.name: varAutoTestInstance
inputs.label: Test instance
inputs.helpMarkDown: To execute the test, an instance of it must be created in a TestSet and used.

options.true: Automatically select existing or create new if none exists

inputs.name: varTestInstID
inputs.label: Test Instance ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: The ID number (found in PC) of the Performance Center test instance.

inputs.name: varProxyUrl
inputs.label: Proxy URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Add your local proxy as following: http(s)://(host):(port#) or leave empty if not using a local proxy.

inputs.name: varProxyUser
inputs.label: Proxy user
inputs.helpMarkDown: The user of the local proxy.

inputs.name: varProxyPassword
inputs.label: Proxy password
inputs.helpMarkDown: The password of the Proxy User. You can create a variable of type secret in the TFS build to store the password (for example: 'ProxyPassword') and specify the variable instead (for example: '$(ProxyPassword)') to avoid exposing a password in the build configuration.

inputs.name: varPostRunAction
inputs.label: Post Run Action
inputs.helpMarkDown: What Action to perform once the Run is finished.

options.AssociatedTrend: Use trend report associated with the test
options.UseTrendReportID: Add run to trend report with ID

inputs.name: varTrendReportID
inputs.label: Trend report ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Trend report ID if you do not want to use the trend report associated with the test.

inputs.name: varTimeslotDuration
inputs.label: Timeslot Duration
inputs.helpMarkDown: The amount of time (in minutes) needed on the host to run this test

inputs.name: varUseVUDs
inputs.label: Use VUDS
inputs.helpMarkDown: The type of Performance Center license used for the test execution.

inputs.name: varUseSLAInStatus
inputs.label: Status according to SLA
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set step status according to SLA.

inputs.name: varArtifactsDir
inputs.label: Artifacts directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Where to place the Log file of the PC task and the analysis/trend report created by the load test execution.
